api_key.description: Klaviyo API Key. See our docs if you need help finding this key: https://go.estuary.dev/JqH0gQ
api_key.title: Api Key

start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated. This field is optional - if not provided, all data will be replicated.
start_date.title: Start Date

resourceConfigSchema.description: ResourceConfig encodes a configured resource stream

namespace.description: Enclosing schema namespace of this resource
namespace.title: Namespace

syncMode.description: Sync this resource incrementally, or fully refresh it every run
syncMode.title: Sync Mode

resourceConfigSchema.title: ResourceConfig
